description:
A soft fleece to make chilly hikes and twilight outings with your 4-legged friend, a lot cozier. With an instantly familiar profile, the CO-Z jacket feels like an old favourite from day one. The high pile fleece holds onto warm air, wicks away moisture, and gives life to more than 18 single use plastic bottles.

  • Thick recycled polyester sherpa fleece has a great warmth to weight ratio and dries quickly
  • Woven recycled nylon overlays add durability and wind resistance in high-wear areas
  • DWR finish on woven overlays
  • Dual pockets give you a place to stash your phone and warm your hands
  • Drawcord at the hem and ribbed cuffs keep the elements from creeping in
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Relaxed fit has a casual comfort and room to layer
name: Kathmandu CO-Z High Pile Jacket - Men's
